item.title: SeaVoice Speech to Text & Text to Speech Discord Bot
item.description: SeaVoice Bot Introduction # üêô The SeaVoice Bot is a new speech-to-text and text-to-speech Discord integration brought to you by Seasalt.ai, a startup run by some of the world‚Äôs leading experts in deep speech recognition, neural speech synthesis, and natural language processing. üêô SeaVoice is a voice intelligence bot that uses advanced AI technology to improve the Discord voice channel experience. One of the great things about Discord‚Äôs text channels is that they maintain a permanent log of the server‚Äôs conversations.
